name: MyPage CMS

screenshots.caption: Manage your administration & other options of system

short_description:
MyPage CMS CMS is a very simple system for creating Web pages, without the need for complex installation and database. It is suitable for anyone, thanks to transparent administration and editing power lost in it. It is published as open-source and therefore free to download for free for both commercial and noncommercial purposes, it can also be arbitrarily modified without the consent of the author.

The system offers the creation, editing and deleting, or a total content management sites, articles, links and headings. Includes advanced text editors, among which you can choose and create the content very easily without any knowledge of problems and programming languages. The editors remind office programs that everyone knows and certainly not a problem to use them.

With a large selection of styles, can make your website look how you want, you can also contact the author with a request to modify any other template, custom or downloaded from the Internet.

summary: MyPage CMS - simple and without SQL database
